Verses: 1 karththar Moseyai Nokki:

2 neengal Thirumbi Migdholukkum Samuththiraththukkum Naduve Paagaalseponukku Munbaaga Irukkira Eerodh Pallaththaakkin Munnadiyile Paalayamirangavendum Endru Isravel Puththirarukkuch Sollu; Adharku Edhiraagach Samuththirakkaraiyile Paalayamiranguveergalaaga.
3 appozhudhu Paarvon Isravel Puththiraraik Kuriththu: Avargal Dhesaththile Thigaiththuth Thirigiraargal; Vanaandharam Avargalai Adaiththuppottadhu Endru Solluvaan.

4 aagaiyaal, Paarvon Avargalaip Pindhodarumbadikku, Naan Avan Irudhayaththaik Kadinappaduththi, Naane Karththar Enbadhai Egipthiyar Ariyumbadi, Paarvonaalum Avanudaiya Ellaa Raanuvaththaalum Magimaippaduven Endraar; Avargal Appadiye Seydhaargal.

5 janangal Odippoivittaargal Endru Egipthin Raajaavukku Arivikkappattapodhu, Janangalukku Virodhamaagap Paarvonum Avan Oozhiyakkaararum Manam Verupattu: Namakku Velai Seyyaadhabadikku Naam Isravelaraip Pogavittadhu Enna Kaariyam Endraargal.
6 avan Than Iradhaththaip Pootti, Than Janangalaik Koottikkondu,
7 piradhaanamaana Arunooru Iradhangalaiyum, Egipthilulla Matra Sagala Iradhangalaiyum, Avaigal Ellaavatrirkum Adhibadhigalaana Veeraraiyum Koottikkondu Ponaan.
8 karththar Egipthin Raajaavaagiya Paarvonin Irudhayaththaik Kadinappaduththinaar; Avan Isravel Puththiraraip Pinthotarndhaan, Isravel Puththirar Balaththa Kaiyudan Purappattup Ponaargal.

9 egipthiyar Paarvonudaiya Sagala Kudhiraigalodum Iradhangalodum Avanudaiya Kudhiraiveerarodum Senaigalodum Avargalaith Thodarndhupoi, Samuththiraththandaiyile Paagaalseponukku Edhire Irukkira Eerodh Pallaththaakkin Munnadiyile Paalayamirangiyirukkira Avargalaik Kittinaargal.

10 paarvon Sameebiththu Varugira Podhu, Isravel Puththirar Thangal Kangalai Ereduththuppaarththu, Egipthiyar Thangalukkup Pinne Varugiradhaik Kandu, Migavum Payandhaargal; Appozhudhu Isravel Puththirar Karththarai Nokkik Kooppittaargal.

11  Andriyum Avargal Moseyai Nokki: Egipthile Piredhakkuzhigal Illaiyendraa Vanaandharaththile Saagumbadikku Engalaik Konduvandheer? Neer Engalai Egipthilirundhu Purappadappanninadhinaal, Engalukku Ippadich Seydhadhu Enna?

12 naangal Egipthile Irukkum Podhu, Naangal Egipthiyarukku Velaiseyya Engalaich Summaa Vittuvidum Endru Sonnom Allavaa? Naangal Vanaandharaththile Saagiradhaippaarkkilum Egipthiyarukku Velaiseygiradhu Engalukku Nalamaayirukkume Endraargal.

13 appozhudhu Mose Janangalai Nokki: Bayappadaadhirungal; Neengal Nindrukondu Indraikkuk Karththar Ungalukkuch Seyyum Iratchippaip Paarungal; Indraikku Neengal Kaangira Egipthiyarai Ini Endraikkum Kaanamaatteergal.
14 karththar Ungalukkaaga Yuththam Pannuvaar; Neengal Summaayiruppeergal Endraan.
15 appozhudhu Karththar Moseyai Nokki: Nee Ennidaththil Muraiyidugiradhu Enna? Purappattup Pongal Endru Isravel Puththirarukkuch Sollu.
16 nee Un Kolai Ongi, Un Kaiyaich Samuththiraththinmel Neetti, Samuththiraththaip Pilandhuvidu; Appozhudhu Isravel Puththirar Samuththiraththin Naduvaaga Vettaandharaiyile Nadandhupovaargal.

17 egipthiyar Ungalaip Pin Thotarndhu Varumbadi Naan Avargal Irudhayaththaik Kadinappaduththi, Paarvonaalum Avan Iradhangal Kudhiraiveerar Mudhalaagiya Avanudaiya Ellaa Raanuvaththaalum Magimaippaduven.
18 ippadi Naan Paarvonaalum Avan Radhangalaalum Avan Kudhiraiveeraraalum Magimaippadumpodhu, Naane Karththar Enbadhai Egipthiyar Arivaargal Endraar.
19 appozhudhu Isravelarin Senaikku Munnaaga Nadandha Dhevadhoodhanaanavar Vilagi, Avargalukkup Pinnaaga Nadandhaar; Avargalukku Mun Irundha Mega Sthambamum Vilagi, Avargal Pinne Nindradhu.

20 adhu Egipthiyarin Senaiyum Isravelarin Senaiyum Raamuzhudhum Ondrodondru Seraadhabadi Avaigal Naduvil Vandhadhu; Egipthiyarukku Adhu Megamum Andhakaaramumaai Irundhadhu, Isravelarukko Adhu Iravai Velichchamaakkitru.

21 mose Than Kaiyaich Samuththiraththinmel Neettinaan; Appozhudhu Karththar Raamuzhudhum Balaththa Keezhkaatrinaal Samuththiram Odhungumbadi Seydhu, Adhai Varandupogappanninaar; Jalam Pilandhu Pirindhupoyitru.
22 isravel Puththirar Samuththiraththin Naduvaaga Vettaandharaiyile Nadandhuponaargal; Avargal Valadhupuraththilum Avargal Idadhupuraththilum Jalam Avargalukku Madhilaaga Nindradhu.
23 appozhudhu Egipthiyar Avargalaith Thodarndhu, Paarvonudaiya Sagala Kudhiraigalodum Radhangalodum Kudhiraiveerarodum Avargal Pirakaale Samuththiraththin Naduve Piravesiththaargal.
24 kizhakku Veluththuvarum Jaamaththil Karththar Akkiniyum Megamumaana Sthampaththilirundhu Egipthiyarin Senaiyaip Paarththu, Avargal Senaiyaik Kalangadiththu,

25 avargaludaiya Radhangalilirundhu Urulaigal Kazharavum, Avargal Thangal Radhangalai Varuththaththode Nadaththavumpaninaar; Appozhudhu Egipthiyar: Isravelaraivittu Odippovom, Karththar Avargalukkuth Thunainindru Egipthiyarukku Virodhamaai Yuththampannugiraar Endraargal.
26 karththar Moseyai Nokki: Jalam Egipthiyarmelum Avargaludaiya Radhangalmelum Avargaludaiya Kudhiraiveerar Melum Thirumbumbadikku, Un Kaiyaich Samuththiraththinmel Neettu Endraar.

27 appadiye Mose Than Kaiyaich Samuththiraththinmel Neettinaan; Vidiyarkaalaththil Samuththiram Balamaai Thirumbi Vandhadhu; Egipthiyar Adharku Edhiraaga Odumpodhu, Karththar Avargalaik Kadalin Naduve Kavizhththuppottaar.

28 jalam Thirumbivandhu, Radhangalaiyum Kudhiraiveeraraiyum Avargal Pinnaaga Samuththiraththil Piravesiththirundha Paarvonudaiya Raanuvam Anaiththaiyum Moodikkondadhu; Avargalil Oruvanaagilum Thappavillai.
29 isravel Puththiraro Samuththiraththin Naduvaaga Vettaandharaiyin Vazhiyaai Nadandhuponaargal; Avargal Valadhu Puraththilum Avargal Idadhupuraththilum Jalam Avargalukku Madhilaaga Nindradhu.
30 ivvidhamaaik Karththar Annaalile Isravelarai Egipthiyarin Kaikkuth Thappuviththu Ratchiththaar; Kadalkaraiyile Egipthiyar Seththukkidakkiradhai Isravelar Kandaargal.

31 karththar Egipdhiyaril Seydha Andha Magaththaana Kiriyaiyai Isravelar Kandaargal; Appozhudhu Janangal Karththarukkup Bayandhu, Karththaridaththilum Avarudaiya Oozhiyakkaaranaagiya Moseyinidaththilum Visuvaasam Vaiththaargal.
